person.persName: SEPTIMUS SNOOKS, a Gentleman connected with the Press—vulgo—Penny-a-liner—with the “Life of a Vagabond.”
DARKEYE DABBS, a returned Convict, and Professor of Housebreaking
PHIL PILFER, (alias Paddington Phil) once a Conductor to a Paddington Omnibus and now a follower of Darkeye Dabbs
MISS CHIPPINGTON CHUBB, daughter to her mother, and heiress apparent to the house of her parent
